medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp abdominal pain associated with burping.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began less than one day ago with sharp right upper quadrant pain. The patient was at baseline health until last night. The burping was the only associated symptom. She sought care when symptoms did not resolve in the morning. Denies fevers, chills, nausea, or emesis. Bowel functions remained the same with last bowel movement one day ago and endorses flatus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Osteoporosis, Depression with anxiety, Hypercholesterolemia, Atrophic vaginitis, Brain aneurysm, Tinnitus.
